item.description:
1.17 UPDATE: If you didn't get a ticket from me don't worry you are still able to get one at the door that ticket price is still $10.00.  Also ticket price and for the items that are being raffled off they are only accepting cash, but don't worry they have an ATM downstairs in the bar area. Looking forward to seeing you there!

 

Don't Call Me Shirley is doing a gig in a new venue.... Let's go cheer them on and dance baby dance!

Come join us for a night of fun with great music from "Don't Call Me Shirley" and raffle prizes! Proceeds from ticket sales, and from the raffle prizes will go to Karen Doringer, and her growing medical expenses. We're going to have a lot of great raffle prizes and the band, "Don't Call Me Shirley," is a WICKED fun band!

 

TICKETS: $10.00... I will have tickets with me at every event going forward.  Or if you don't come to an event before we go to this event, then email me (msdondon2003@yahoo.com) and I will give you info for paying/getting the tickets.  Please note there are no refunds.

PARKING: Plenty in the parking lot behind the Barn.

What do you say you can't dance.... can you tap your foot?  Come on down to the Barn and have some fun with a "wicked fun band" and a wicked fun group of people!!

This event will be scheduled on my 2 Meetup sites, (Our Circle of Friends and Connection & Friends) there may be more people going to this event then you see.

Take a minute now and put the Meetup phone into your phone, that way if you are are running late, can’t find us or need to cancel at the last minute:  978-304-2811, please note this phone does not accept text messages.

Is it time for you to pay your dues?  Due's are $5.00 for the year (even if you are in 1 or 2 o my groups).  Please look at your profile page where it states “Membership dues last recorded by your Organizer” You can pay your dues at any event.  Thank you in advance for paying your dues!

As a courtesy to everyone in the group come back to the event page and change your RSVP if your plans change or call me/send a message through the site.

Looking forward to seeing you at this event!

Donna
item.how_to_find_us: We will be upstairs come on up and find us.
item.name: Don't Call Me Shirley in a new Venue.... it's a fundraiser.
